1 GT1 bstod tshogs, ka11PD31338bstod tshogs
1b1-6b2(p.1-12) khyad par du 'phags pa'i bstod pa bi shaSh+Ta stA pa khyad par du 'phags pa'i bstod pa/ slob dpon mtho btsun grub rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po sarbA dz+nyA de bA dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de rin chen mchog gis bsgyur/ slad kyi ban+de dpal brtsegs rak+Shi tas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o
2 GT2 bstod tshogs, ka11PD31338bstod tshogs
6b2-58b4(p.5-1-2) khyad par du 'phags pa'i bstod pa'i rgya cher bshad pa bi she shasta pa nA ma TI kA khyad par du 'phags pa zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstod pa/ slob dpon mtho btsun grub rjes mdzad pa'i rgya cher bshad pa/ byang phyogs kyi rgyud du byung ba/ b+haM ga la'i yul gyis slob dpon shes rab go chas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta dzA ran+da na dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ yid srubs zla ba'i gtsug dang gos gser can/ rig byed byed po dga' byed grog mkhar pa/ rgyas pa rgyal dpog pa dang sa yi bu/ thub pa rkang mig phur bu lha min rjes/ skyob pa nyid mor byed pa'i rgyud 'khrungs pa/ srid gsum bla ma shAkya'I rgyal po de'i/ rnam par thar la bskrun min der bstod pa/ de yi 'grel pa de 'dir rdzogs par bas/ dge ba de yis srid pa'i ljongs rgyu pas/ bdag tu 'dzin pa'i thibs par 'khyams gyur pa/ mu stegs byed kyi mun pa 'joms byed pa'i/ rgyal ba nyin mor byed par bdag gyur cig / khyad par du 'phags par bstod pa'i rgya cher bshad pa/ slob dpon shes rab go chas mdzad pa las/ bar skabs su tshigs su bcad pa bcu gnyis kyi 'grel pa'i rgya dpe ma rnyed nas/ dus phyis shAkya'i dge slong kun dga' rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po zhes bya ba/ dpal sa skya'i dgon par sbyar pa rdzogs so
3 GT3 bstod tshogs, ka11PD31338bstod tshogs
58b4-59b5(p.31-1-4) thams cad mkhyen pa dbang phyug chen po'i bstod pa zhes bya ba sarba dz+nye ma hA sh+wa ra sto tra na ma tham cad mkhyen pa dbang phyug chen po zhes bya ba'i bstod pa bram ze'i dge bsnyen mtho btsun grub rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dza ran+da na dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba rin chen bzang pos bsgyur ba'o
4 GT4 bstod tshogs, ka11PD31338bstod tshogs
60b1-62a6(p.30-3-1) lha las phul du byung bar bstod pa de wA ti sh+ya sto tra lha las phul du byung ba'i bstod pa / slob dpon bde byed bdag pas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po sarba dz+nyA de wa dang / lo ts+tsha ba ban+de rin chen mchog gis bsgyur/ zhu chen gyi lo tsA ban+de dpal rtsegs rak+Shi tas gtan la phab pa'o
5 GT5 bstod tshogs, ka11PD31338bstod tshogs
62a6-84a5(p.32-1-6) lha las phul du byung bar bstod pa'i rgya cher 'grel pa de wA ti shA ya sto tra TI kA lha las phul du byung bar bstod pa'i rgya cher bshad pa/ slob dpon shes rab go chas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzA ran+dA na'i zhal snga nas dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos sgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o
6 GT6 bstod tshogs, ka11PD31338bstod tshogs
85b1-86a6(p.43-4-1)
bud+d+ha s+ya sto tra nA ma
7 GT7 bstod tshogs, ka11PD31338bstod tshogs
86a6-87b1(p.44-1-6) chos kyi sku la gnas pa'i yon tan thun mong ma yin pa la bstod pa
chos kyi sku la gnas pa'i yon tan thun mong ma yin pa la bstod pa/ slob dpon thogs med kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /shi len+d+ra bo d+hi dang / zhus chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa
8 GT8 bstod tshogs, ka11PD31338bstod tshogs
87b1-88b2(p.45-2-1) de kho na nyid la bstod pa ta t+wa sta ba de kho na nyid la bstod pa/ /shAkya'i dge slong dpal gyi go chas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po many+dzu shri b+ha dra dang / dge slong shAkya 'od kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa
9 GT9 bstod tshogs, ka11PD31338bstod tshogs
88b2-89a3(p.45-3-2) bdud btul ba la bstod pa
bdud btul ba la bstod pa/ rab dga'i lha'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so
10 GT10 bstod tshogs, ka11PD31338bstod tshogs
90b1-95b1(p.47-1-1) chos kyi dbyings su bstod pa d+harma d+hA tu sto tra chos kyi dbyings su bstod pa slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po kriSh+Na paN+Di ta dang / lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur ba'o
11 GT11 bstod tshogs, ka11PD31338bstod tshogs
95b1-96b6(p.49-2-1) dpe med par bstod pa ni rU pa masta dpe med par bstod pa slob dpon klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po kriSh+Na paN+Di ta dang lo tsA ba tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur ba'o
12 GT12 bstod tshogs, ka11PD31338bstod tshogs
96b6-98a5(p.49-3-6) 'jig rten las 'das par bstod pa lo kA tI ta sta ba 'jig rten las 'das par bstod pa slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po kriSh+Na paN+Di ta dang / lo tsA ba tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur cing zhus te gten la phab pa'o
13 GT13 bstod tshogs, ka11PD31338bstod tshogs
98a5-98b4(p.50-1-5) sems kyi rdo rje'i bstod pa tsit+ta badzra sta ba sems kyi rdo rde'i bstod pa slob dpon klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so
14 GT14 bstod tshogs, ka11PD31338bstod tshogs
98b4-99b1(p.51-1-4) don dam par bstod pa pa ra ma thAr+tha sta ba don dam par bstod pa slob dpon klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po kriSh+Na paN+Di ta dang lo tsA ba dgi slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o
15 GT15 bstod tshogs, ka11PD31338bstod tshogs
99b1-100a4(p.51-2-1) sku gsum la bstod pa kA ya tri ya sto tra nA ma sku gsum la bstod pa zhes bya ba slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po kriSh+Na paN+Di ta dang / /lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o
16 GT16 bstod tshogs, ka11PD31338bstod tshogs
101b1-106a5(p.51-4-1) sku gsum la bstod pa zhes bya ba'i rnam par 'grel pa kA ya tra ya sto tra nA ma s+ya bi bar nA ma slob dpon klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa'i sku gsum la bstod pa zhes bya ba'i 'grel pa rdzogs so//rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrad+d+ha ka ra warma dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba ban+de rin chen bzang pos gsar du bsgyur cing zhus pa lags so
17 GT17 bstod tshogs, ka11PD31338bstod tshogs
106a5-107a6(p.54-1-5) sems can mgu bar bya ba'i bstod pa sa t+wa ra dA na sta pa sems can mgu bar bya ba'i bstod pa slob dpon klu sgrub kyis tshigs su bcad pa'i sgo nas bsdus pa rdzogs so//rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta chen po di paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA na dang / lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur cing zhus te gnas la phab pa'o
18 GT18 bstod tshogs, ka11PD31338bstod tshogs
108b1-109b2(p.55-3-1) shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bstod pa pra dz+nyA pA ra mi ta sto taM shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma'i bstod pa slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//kha che'i paN+Di ta thig le bum pa dang / lo tsA ba blo ldan shes rab kyis bsgyur ba'o
19 GT19 bstod tshogs, ka11PD31338bstod tshogs
109b2-112a6(p.55-4-2) bsam gyis mi khyab par bstod pa a tsin+ta sta ba bsam gyis mi khyab par bstod pa slob dpon chen po klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas mdzad ma rdzogs so
20 GT20 bstod tshogs, ka11PD31338bstod tshogs
112b1-113b1(p.57-3-1) bstod pa las 'das par bstod pa ru ta sti sta ba bstod pa las 'das par bstod pa slob dpon chen po 'phags pa klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so
21 GT21 bstod tshogs, ka11PD31338bstod tshogs
113b1-113b6(p.57-4-1) bla na med pa'i bstod pa ni ru t+t+a sta pa bla na med pa'i bstod pa slob dpon chen po 'phags pa klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so
22 GT22 bstod tshogs, ka11PD31338bstod tshogs
113b6-114a6(p.57-4-6) 'phags pa rje btsun 'jam dpal gyi don dam pa'i bstod pa zhes bya ba Ar+ya b+haT+TA ra ka many+dzu shrI pa ra mAr+tha stu ti nA ma 'phags pa rje btsun 'jam dpal gyi don dam par bstod pa zhes bya ba slob dpon klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so
23 GT23 bstod tshogs, ka11PD31338bstod tshogs
115b1-116b2(p.59-2-1) rje btsun 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi snying rje la bstod pa Ar+ya many+dzu shrI b+haT+Ta ra ka kA ru Na sto tra rje btsun 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi snying rje la bstod pa slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so
24 GT24 bstod tshogs, ka11PD31338bstod tshogs
116b2-117a4(p.59-3-2) gnas chen po brgyad kyi mchod rten la bstod pa aSh+Ta ma hA s+tha na tsai ta sto tra gnas chen po brgyad kyi mchod rten la bstod pa/ slob dpon chen po klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so
25 GT25 bstod tshogs, ka11PD31338bstod tshogs
117a5-117b6(p.58-4-5) gnas chen po brgyad kyi mchod rten la bstod pa aSh+Ta ma hA s+tha ma tsai ta sto tra gnas chen po brgyad kyi mchod rten la bstod pa/ slob dpon chen po klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so
26 GT26 bstod tshogs, ka11PD31338bstod tshogs
118b1-119a6(p.61-1-1) mdzad pa bcu gnyis kyi tshul la bstod pa zhes bya ba d+wI da sha kA ra nA ma na yA sto traM mdzad pa bcu gnyis kyi tshul la bstod pa zhes bya ba slob dpon klu sgrub gyi mdzad pa rdzogs so
27 GT27 bstod tshogs, ka11PD31338bstod tshogs
119a6-120a1(p.60-2-6) phyag 'tshal ba'i bstod pa zhes bya ba ban+da na sto tra nA ma phyag 'tshal ba'i bstod pa slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so
28 GT28 bstod tshogs, ka11PD31338bstod tshogs
120a1-120b6(p.60-3-1) dmyal ba nas 'don pa zhes bya ba na ro god+d+hi nA ma dmyal ba nas 'don pa zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa'o/ /dpal ra sa ra mo che'i gtsug lag khang du grong khyer dpe med paN+Di ta ti la ka dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba chen po shAkya'i dge slong pa tshab nyi ma grags kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o
29 GT29 bstod tshogs, ka11PD31338bstod tshogs
121b1-143a6(p.61-4-1) sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa bsngags par 'os pa bsngags pa las bstod par mi nus par bstod pa zhes bya ba bar+Na ra ha ba ra Ne b+ha ga to/ bud+d+ha sto tra ya shA kya sta ba nA ma sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa bsngags par 'os pa bsngags pa zhes bya ba slob dpon ma tri tsi Tas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po sarbA dz+nyA na de ba dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de dpal brtsegs rak+Shi tas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa (141b) sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa bsngags par 'os pa bsngags pa zhes bya ba slob dpon ma tri tsi Tas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po pad+ma ka ra dang / lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur ba'o(143a)
30 GT30 bstod tshogs, ka11PD31338bstod tshogs
144b1-144b6(p.73-3-1) dkon mchog gsum la bkra shis kyi bstod pa tri rat+na maM ga la sto tra dkon mchog gsum la bkra shis kyi bstod pa slob dpon ma ti tsi tras mdzad pa rdzogs so//rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+yA ka ra sing ha pra b+ha dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de dpal brtsegs rak+Shi tas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa
31 GT31 bstod tshogs, ka11PD31338bstod tshogs
145a1-146a1(p.72-4-1) yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mtshan la bstod pa saM myak+sam+bud+d+ha ya ka ta sto traM yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mtshan la bstod pa/ snyan ngag mkhan chen po slob dpon ma ti tras mdzad pa rdzogs so
32 GT32 bstod tshogs, ka11PD31338bstod tshogs
146a1-146b3(p.74-1-1) gcig las 'phros pa'i bstod pa e kot+ta ri ka sto traM gcig las 'phros pa'i bstod pa//slob dpon ma te tsi tras mdzad pa rdzogs so//rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+harma shrI bad+d+ra dang / lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus pa
33 GT33 bstod tshogs, ka11PD31338bstod tshogs
147b1-149a6(p.75-2-1) bde bar gshegs pa sum cu so lnga'i bstod pa mtshan rin po ches spras pa su ga ta pany+tsa tri rat+na nA ma ma la sto traM bde bar gshegs pa sum cu tsa lnga'i bstod pa mtshan rin po ches spras pa zhes bya ba/ slob dpon ma ti tsi tras mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya garagyi mkhan po su ma ka ra warma dang / lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o
34 GT34 bstod tshogs, ka11PD31338bstod tshogs
150b1-151a2(p.77-1-1) tshigs su bcad pa brgyad pa'i bstod pa pa dar+b+h+ya aSh+Ta sto traM tshig brgyad pa'i bstod pa dge bsnyen mtha' yas lhas mdzad pa rdzogs so
35 GT35 bstod tshogs, ka11PD31338bstod tshogs
151a2-151a6(p.76-2-2) dkon mchog gsum la bstod pa tri rat+na sto tra dkon mchog gsum la bstod pa/ slob dpon chen po ma ti tsi tras mdzad pa rdzogs so
36 GT36 bstod tshogs, ka11PD31338bstod tshogs
151a6-158a3(p.76-2-6) dkon mchog gsum la bstod pa'i 'grel pa tri rat+na sto stra b+hi ti dkon mchog gsum la bstod pa'i 'grel pa/ slob dpon rgyal ba'i sras kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na shan+ti dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba ban+de dpal gyi lhun po'o sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o
37 GT37 bstod tshogs, ka11PD31338bstod tshogs
158a3-158a6(p.80-1-3) dkon mchog gsum gyi bstod pa tri rat+na sto tra dkon mchog gsum gyi bstod pa/ slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so
38 GT38 bstod tshogs, ka11PD31338bstod tshogs
159b1-167b1(p.81-2-1) brgya lnga bcu pa zhes bya ba'i bstod pa sha ta pany+tsA sha ti ka nA ma s+ya sto tra brgya lnga bcu pa'i bstod pa slob dpon mkhas pa chen po bram ze rta dbyangs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrI shrad+d+hA ka ra warma dang //lo tsA ba shAkya blo gros kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o
39 GT39 bstod tshogs, ka11PD31338bstod tshogs
168b1-254a6(p.85-3-1) brgya lnga bcu pa zhes bya ba'i bstod pa'i 'grel pa sha ta pany+tsa sha ta nA ma s+ya sto tra TI ka brgya lnga bcu pa zhes bya ba'i bstod pa'i 'grel pa dge slong dga' byed snyen pas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrI shrad+d+hA ka ra warma dang lo tsA ba shAkya blo gros kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o
40 GT40 bstod tshogs, ka11PD31338bstod tshogs
255b1-259b4(p.129-2-1) gaN+Di'i bstod pa tshigs su bcad pa gan+Di sto tra gA tha gaN+Di'i bstod pa tshigs su bcad pa slob dpon rta dbyangs kyi mdzad pa rdzogs so//mkhas pa chen po rgyal ba'i sde'i zhal snga nas dang / lo tsA ba btsun ba d+harma yon tan gyis bsgyur ba'o
41 GT41 bstod tshogs, ka11PD31338bstod tshogs
260b1-276b6(p.131-3-1) spel mar bstod pa zhes bya ba mi shra ka sto tra nA ma spel mar bstod pa zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po ma tra tsi Ta dang / slob dpon phyogs kyi glang po dag gi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so//rgya gar gyi mkhan po ku ma ra ka la sha dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong bsod nams bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o
42 GT42 bstod tshogs, ka11PD31338bstod tshogs
277b1-278a4(p.139-4-1) de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bstod pa sarba ta thA ga ta sto traM de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bstod pa rdzogs so
43 GT43 bstod tshogs, ka11PD31338bstod tshogs
278a4-279a4(p.140-1-4) bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i bstod pa b+ha ga bAn shAkya mu ne sto tra bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i bstod pa slob dpon dkon mchog gsum gyi 'bangs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so
44 GT44 bstod tshogs, ka11PD31338bstod tshogs
280b1-286a3(p.141-3-1) yon tan mtha' yas par bstod pa gu Na a bar+yan+ta sto traM yon tan mtha' yas par bstod pa slob dpon dkon mchog 'bangs dkyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po sarba dz+nyA de ba dang / lo tsA ba ban+de rin chen mchog gis bsgyur/ zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de dpal brtsegs kyis zhus te gtan la phab pa
45 GT45 bstod tshogs, ka11PD31338bstod tshogs
286a3-289b3(p.144-1-3) yon tan mtha' yas par bstod pa'i 'grel pa gu Na a ba r+yan sto tra TI kA yon tan mtha' yas par bstod pa'i 'grel pa/ slob dpon chen po phyogs kyi glang pos mdzad pa rdzogs so//rgya gar gyi mkhan po sarba dz+nyA de ba dang / lo tsA ba ban de rin chen mchog gis bsgyur ba'o
46 GT46 bstod tshogs, ka11PD31338bstod tshogs
290b1-291a3(p.147-1-1) yon tan mtha' yas par bstod pa'i don gyi tshig le'u byas pa gu Na a bar+yan+ta sto tra ba tu kA ri kA yon tan mtha' yas par bstod pa don gyi tshigs le'u byas pas/ slob dpon chen po phyogs kyi glang pos mdzad pa rdzogs so//rgya gar gyi mkhan po sarba dz+nyA de ba dang / lo tsA ba ban+de rin chen mchog gis sgyur/ zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de dpal brtsegs rak+Shi tas zhus nas gtan la phab pa'o
47 GT47 bstod tshogs, ka11PD31338bstod tshogs
291a3-292a6(p.146-2-3) sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la bstod pa bud+d+ha s+ya ni bA na sto tra sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la bstod pa slob dpon po dpal ldan chos kyi grags pas mdzad pa rdzogs so
48 GT48 bstod tshogs, ka11PD31338bstod tshogs
293b1-297a1(p.147-4-1) bshags pa'i bstod pa de sha na sta ba bshags pa'i bstod pa zhes bya ba slob dpon tsan+d+ra go mis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po bud+d+hA kA ra warma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gten la phab pa'o
49 GT49 bstod tshogs, ka11PD31338bstod tshogs
297a1-330b2(p.148-4-1) bshags pa'i bstod pa'i 'grel pa de sha na sta ba brit+ti bshags bstod kyi 'grel pa slob dpon sangs rgyas zhi bas mdzad pa rdzogs so//rgya gar gyi mkhan po bud+d+hA shra shAn+ti dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa
50 GT50 bstod tshogs, ka11PD31338bstod tshogs
331b1-332b6(p.167-2-1) sangs rgyas dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i bstod pa bud+d+ha a b+hi She ja nA ma sto tra sangs rgyas dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i bstod pa rdzogs so//lo tsA ba chen po rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab
51 GT51 bstod tshogs, ka11PD31338bstod tshogs
332b6-333a6(p.167-3-6) bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa dpal rdo rje 'dzin gyi dbyangs shrI badzra d+ha ra saM gI ta b+ha ga bAM sto tra bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa dpal rdo rje 'dzin gyi dbyangs rdzogs so//rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+yA kA ra pra b+ha dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de dpal brtsegs kyis bsgyur ceng zhus te gtan la phab pa
52 GT52 bstod tshogs, ka11PD31338bstod tshogs
333a6-341b2(p.166-4-6) bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa dpal rdo rje 'dzin gyi dbyangs kyi rgya cher bshad pa shrI badzra d+ha ra saM gI ta b+ha ga ba ti sto tra TI kA bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa dpal rdo rje 'dzin gyi dbyangs kyi rgya cher bshad pa mang du thos pa'i slob dpon zhi ba 'tshos 'phags pa 'jam pa'i mchog gi zhabs kyi pad ma'i rdul la brten pas mdzad pa rdzogs so//rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+yA kA ra pra b+hA dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de dpal btsegs kyis bsgyur cing zhus nas gtan la phab pa

1b1-176b5(p.1-2-1) kye'i rdo rje bsdus pa'i don gyi rgya cher 'grel pa he badzra pA Ni DAr+tha TI kA kye'i rdo rje bsdus pa stong phrag drug par/ de kho na nyid nges pa mdor bstan pa'i mdor bsdus chen po'i/ de ltar kho na nyid kyi le'u rdzogs so/ /dpal kye'i rdo rje'i bsdus pa'i don gyis 'grel pa rdzogs so/ /rje btsun byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos mdzad pa'o/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po dA na shi la dang / lo tsA ba 'bro seng dkar shAkya 'od kyis bsgyur ba/ slad kyis rgya gar gyi mkhan po su b+hU ti shrI shAn+ti dang / /lo tsA ba cog gru ting nge 'dzin bzang pos zhus so/ /yang slad kyis rgya gar gyi mkhan po rgyal po'i sras/ /dpal 'jig med lha'i zhal sngar lo tsA ba snyel cor dge slong pradz+nyA kIrtis yul dbus 'gyur gyi dpes gtan la phab pa/ /slar yang dpal ldan shong ston rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyis legs par gshad pa la sogs pa'i mthu las/ brda sprod pa'i tshul rig pa'i dpang lo tsA ba dpal ldan blo gros brtan pas/ /byang chub sems dpa'i 'grel pa bskor gsum gyi tshula la shin tu dad cing blo'i snang ba rgyas pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ra lung pa chos gags dpal bzang pos/ slob dpon chen po zhi ba 'tsho'i zhabs dpon slob kyis mdzad pa'i/ dbu ma'i gzhung lugs chen po de kho na nyid bsdus pa rtsa 'gril gyi glegs bam bris te yon du gnang nas yang dang yang du bskul ba'i dor legs par bcos te bsgyur cing zhus nas gtan nas phab pa'i yi ge pa ni 'dzad ston kun dga' rgyal mtshan zhes bya'o
311 GT316 rgyud 'grel, ba161PD31353
176b1-243b6(p.91-1-1) kye'i rdo rje'i rgyud kyi dka' 'grel pad ma can zhes bya ba he badzra tan+t+ra pany+dzi kA pad+ma ni nA ma slob dpon mtsho skyes rdo rje'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa/ dpal kye'i rdo rje'i 'grel pad+ma can zhes bya ba rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po mkhas pa chen po k+Shi ti gar+b+hA'i zhal snga nas/ zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba khu ston dngos grub kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa las/ dben gnas rtsed kyi stag lung du slad nas yang skad gsar chad kyis TI kA dang gtugs te gtan la phab pa'o
312 GT317 rgyud 'grel, ba161PD31353
244b1-392b2(p.125-1-1) dpal dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i rnam bshad rnam par 'grel pa zhes bya ba shrI he badzra s+ya bya khyaM bi war+Na nA ma dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i rnam par 'grel pa ba pa b+ha Ta zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po puN+ye kirti dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba bsod nams rgyal mtshan gyis/ sgra don gnyis dang mi 'gal tsam du bsgyur
313 GT318 rgyud 'grel, ma171PD31354
1b1-90b4(p.1-2-1) dgyes pa rdo rje'i dka' 'grel rnal 'byor rin po che'i phreng ba zhes bya ba yo ga rat+na mA la nA ma he badzra pany+tsi kA dpal dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i dka' 'grel/ rnal 'byor rin po che'i phreng ba las/ brtags pa gnyis pa'i le'u bcu gnyis pa'i 'grel pa'o/ /slob dpon dkyil 'khor pa nag po pas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po kriSh+Na paN+Di ta dang / lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o
314 GT319 rgyud 'grel, ma171PD31354
91b1-453b3(p.47-2-1) rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal kye'i rdo rje'i 'grel bshad kha sbyar shin tu dri ma med pa zhes bya ba shrI he badzra tan+t+ra rA dza TI kA sa bi Sha da saM pU Ta nA ma rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal kye'i rdo rje'i 'grel bshad kha sbyor shin tu dri ma med pa zhes bya ba grub pa'i slob dpon chen po d+haM ka dA shas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /smin drug zla ba la ni paN+Di ta mchog dpal ldan chos kyi rgyal po'i bkas/ kye yi rdo rje'i 'grel bshal yon tan mchog ldan d+haM ka dA shas mdzad pa ni/ gang zhig dpan ldan kha che'i yul du 'khrungs pa dri med dpal zhes mtshan gsol dang / s+thi ra ma ti'i rnam rgyas mdzes pa dag gis 'dir ni legs par bsgyur ba'o/ /thun mong dang thun mong ma yin pa'i yan tan mtha' yas pa brnyes pa bla ma dam pa chos kyi rgyal po'i bka' lung gis dpon zhang btsun gyis ton bdag byas te phye dang nang ge gzhung lugs rgya mtsho'i pha rol tu phyin pa kha che'i paN+Di ta chen po bi ma la shrI b+ha dra'i zhal nas/ /bod kyo lo tsA ba dge slong blo brtan gyis dpal sa skya'i gtsug lag khang du legs par bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'i yi ge pa ni slong bsod nams dbang phyug ces bya ba'o
315 GT320 rgyud 'grel, tsa181PD31355
1b1-80a5(p.1-2-1) kau mu di zhes bya ba'i dka' 'grel kau mu di pany+dzi kA nA ma slob dpon mkhas pa dpal sbyang dka' ba'i zla bas mdzad pa/ dpal kye'i rdo rje'i dka' 'grel kau mu di zhes bya ba rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA in+d+ra ru tsi dang /lo tsA ba dge slong shAkya yi shes kyis bsgyur ba'o
316 GT321 rgyud 'grel, tsa181PD31355
81b1-218a5(p.41-4-1) rdo rje'i tshig gi snying po bsdud pa'i dka' 'grel badzra pA da sA ra saM gra ha pany+dzi kA dpal kye'i rdo rje'i rgyud la kha che chen pos rtogs pa gnas brtan dul ba'i dpal bshes gnyen gyis gsol ba btab pa rdo rje'i tshig gi snying po bsdus pa'i dka' 'grel du brtag pa gnyis pa le'u bcu gnyis pa rdzogs so/ /kha che'i paN+Di ta chen po shAkya shrI bzang po'i zhal snga nas/ bod kyi lo tsA ba dpal chos kyi bzang pos/ dpal bkra shis gser sdings kyi gtsug lag khang du legs par zhus shing bsgyur te gtan la phab pa'o/ /slar yang dpal ldan shong rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi legs bshad la sogs pa'i mthu las/ brda sprod pa'i tshul rig pa'i dpang lo tsA pa dpal ldan blo gros brtan pas byang chub sems dpa'i 'grel pa bskor gsum gyi tshul la shin tu dang cing blo'i snang ba rgyas pa'i dge bi bshes gnyen ra lung pa chos grags dpal bzang pos/ slob dpon zhi ba 'tsho'i zhabs dpon slob kyis mdzad pa'i dbu ma'i gzhung lugs chen po de kho na nyid bsdus pa rtsa 'grel gyi glegs bam bris te yon du gnang nas/ yang yang du bskul ba'i ngor legs par bcos pa bsgyur cing zhus nas gtan la phab pa'i yi ge pa ni/ 'dzad ston kun dga' rgyal mtshan zhes bya'o
317 GT322 rgyud 'grel, tsa181PD31355
219b1-288a1(p.111-2-1) rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dgyes pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba sgyu ma brtag pa gnyis pa'i dka' 'grel dran pa'i 'byung gnas zhes bya ba he bdzra nA ma ma hA tan+t+ra rA dza du kal+pa mA yA s+ya pany+dzi ka smr-i ti ni ba da nA ma brtag pa'i rgyal po gnyis pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po dpal ldan zla ba dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba chen po mgos lha bcas kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa
318 GT323 rgyud 'grel, tsa181PD31355
288a1-325a6(p.144-3-1) kye'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po'i 'grel pa
mdo sde stong bzhi brgya shes pa'i slob dpon pad+ma'i myu gu rdo rje'i zhabs kyis/ kye'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po'i 'grel pa mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po pad+ma A ka ra la mtshur ston dbyig gi rgyal mtshan la sogs pas zhus nas/ bla ma bde gshegs zhabs kyi grags pa yi/ slob ma'i mthar gyur rin chen 'bar ba ni/ blo zhen la sogs rgya gar skad mi mkhas/ des bsgyur kye yi rdo rje'i dka' 'grel la/ mkhas mchog btsun pa rnams kyis dbyas mi zhu/ dad pa bskyed nas bsgyur ba'o
319 GT324 rgyud 'grel, tsa181PD31355

328 GT333 rgyud 'grel, dza211PD31358
1b1-460a5(p.1-2-1) dpal yang dag par sbyor ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po'i rgya cher 'grel pa man ngag gi snye ma zhes bya ba shrI saM pu Ta tan+t+ra rA dza TI kA ma nA ya many+dza rI nA ma dpal yang dag par sbyor ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po'i rgya cher 'grel pa man ngag gi snye ma/ mkhas pa chen po 'jigs med 'byung gnas kyis sbas pas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rnam gnon tshul mkhas 'jig med kyis/ gnad la reg pa'i tshig 'di ni//dga' ba skyong gi rgyal srid lo/ /sum cu tsa bdun pa la byas/ yul dbus kyi mkhas pa chen po de nyid dang / mang du thos pa'i bsod snyoms pa sangs rgyas grags pas na len+d+rara bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o/ /yang slad nas ma hA paN+Di ta shAkya shrI dang / dpyal lo tsA ba chos kyi bzang pos yul dbus kyi dpe dang bstun nas bcos shing bsgyur te zhu tig dag par bgyis so/ /slar yang bla ma dam pa rnams kyi bka' drin dang sbyin bdag rnams kyis mthun rkyen bsgrubs pa la rten nas legs par sbyar ba brda sprod pa'i tshul la blo'i snang ba cung zad skyes pa dpang lo tsA ba dge slong dpal ldan blo gros brtan pas/ rgya gar gyi dpe gnyis la gtugs te/ 'di'i snga 'gyur ma dag pa gzigs pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen sde snod 'dzin pa mang po'i gsung gis bskul nas/ bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//

43b6-44b6(p.23-2-6) de nyid bde ba sgom pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'i rnal 'byor sgom pa'i man ngag ces bya ba a nu yo ga ta t+wa b+ha ba na aSh+Na de sha yi nA ma de nyid bde ba sgom pa'i rjes su 'brang pa'i rnal 'byor sgom pa'i man ngag ces bya ba/ slob dpon ku ku ri pas mdzad pa rdzogs so//
1233 GT1238 rgyud 'grel, tshi501PD31387
44b6-45b1(p.23-3-6) 'dzag pa gcod pa'i man ngag case bya ba sra ba pa ri ts+tshe da na nA ma dzag pa gcod pa'i man ngag ces bya ba/ slob dpon ku ku ri pas mdzad pa rdzogs so//
1234 GT1239 rgyud 'grel, tshi501PD31387
45b1-45b6(p.23-4-1) mu stegs kyi gtum mo zhes bya ba ti thi ka tsaN+Da lo ka nA ma mu stegs kyi gtum mo zhes bya ba/ slob dpon a tsin+tas mdzad pa rdzogs so//
1235 GT1240 rgyud 'grel, tshi501PD31387
45b6-46b5(p.23-4-6) gser 'gyur gyi rtsi zhes bya ba d+ha tur+b+ha d+ha nA ma gser 'gyur gyi rtsi'i gdams pa/ slob dpon na lis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
1236 GT1241 rgyud 'grel, tshi501PD31387
46b5-47a6(p.25-1-5) sems dang sems nyid 'dul ba'i thabs zhes bya ba tsit+ta tse ti la sha pa no pa yaM sems dang sems nyid 'dul pa'i thabs zhes bya ba/ slob dpon shAn+ta de ba nas brgyud pa/ slob dpon me ko las gsungs pa rdzogs so//
1237 GT1242 rgyud 'grel, tshi501PD31387
47a6-48a5(p.24-2-6) lha kun gyi rdzogs pa'i lam zhes bya ba sarba de ba d+ha ni sa paM kra ma marga nA ma lha kun gyi rdzogs pa'i rim pa/ g+ha d+ha ris mdzad pa rdzogs so//
1238 GT1243 rgyud 'grel, tshi501PD31387
48a5-48b5(p.24-3-5) nyi zla bcing ba'i thabs zhes bya ba so ma sUr+ya ban+d+ha no pa ya nA ma nyi zla bcings pa'i thabs zhes bya ba/ slob dpon birU pa nas brgyud pa/ ka ma ris mdzad pa rdzogs so//
1239 GT1244 rgyud 'grel, tshi501PD31387
48b5-49a5(p.25-3-5) sems kyi thig le hUM nyid bsgom pa'i rim pa zhes bya ba hUM kar tsit+t+a bin+du b+ha ba na kra ma sems kyi thig le'i hUM nyid bsgom pa'i rim pa zhes bya ba/ slob dpon dzA lan+d+ha ris mdzad pa rdzogs so//
1240 GT1245 rgyud 'grel, tshi501PD31387
49a5-50a3(p.24-4-5) bsam gyis mi khyab pa bsgom pa zhes bya ba a tsin+ta b+ha va ti pa ri b+ha ba na nA ma tshad med bzhi bsam gyis mi khyab pa sgom pa zhes bya ba/ slob dpon rA hu las mdzad pa rdzogs so//
1241 GT1246 rgyud 'grel, tshi501PD31387
50a3-50b6(p.26-1-3) hUM yig sems nyid thig le bsgom pa'i rim pa zhes bya ba hUM ka ra tsit+ta bin+du b+ha ba na kra nA ma hUM yig sems nyid thig le bsgom pa'i rim pa zhes bya ba/ slob dpon nag po pa nas brgyud pa'i/ slob dpon d+harma pas mdzad pa rdzogs so//
1242 GT1247 rgyud 'grel, tshi501PD31387
50b6-51b2(p.27-1-6) rang bzhin grub pa zhes bya ba pra kri ti sid+d+hi nA ma rang bzhin grub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba/ slob dpon rdo ka ris mdzad pa rdzogs so//
1243 GT1248 rgyud 'grel, tshi501PD31387
51b2-52a3(p.27-2-2) lhan cig skyes pa'i gdams pa zhes bya ba sa ha dza an+ta yi nA ma lhan skyes zung 'jug gi gdams pa/ slob dpon me d+hi nas mdzad pa rdzogs so//
1244 GT1249 rgyud 'grel, tshi501PD31387
52a3-53a6(p.26-3-3) bla med sbyor pa'i rim pa zhes bya ba a nut+ta ra sarba shd+d+he kre m-i nA ma bla med sbyor pa'i rim pa zhes bya ba/ slob dpon bAng+ga dzas mdzad pa rdzogs so//
1245 GT1250 rgyud 'grel, tshi501PD31387
53a6-54b5(p.26-4-6) a phreng ka phreng gi sngags kyi rim pa zhes bya ba A li kA li man tra dz+nyA na nA ma a li kA li'i rnal 'byor zhes bya ba/ slob dpon g+han+d+has mdzad pa rdzogs so//
1246 GT1251 rgyud 'grel, tshi501PD31387
54b5-55b4(p.29-1-5) ka phreng bsgom pa'i lam zhes bya ba kA li marga b+ha ba na nA ma ka phreng sgom pa'i lam zhes bya ba/ slob dpon d+ha ma d+hu mas mdzad pa rdzogs so//
1247 GT1252 rgyud 'grel, tshi501PD31387
55b4-56b1(p.29-2-4) a phreng ka phreng bde mchog 'khor lo'i rnal 'byor chen po bsgom pa zhes bya ba sam+bara tsakre sh+wa ra A li kA l-i ma hA yo ga b+ha ba na nA ma a phreng ka phreng bde mchog 'khor lo'i rnal 'byor chen po bsgom pa zhes bya ba/ slob dpon sA ga ras mdzad pa rdzogs so//
1248 GT1253 rgyud 'grel, tshi501PD31387
56b1-57b6(p.29-3-1) rlung gnas dang nad kyi brtag pa zhes bya ba bA yu s+tha na ro ga ba rig dz+nyA na nA ma rlung gnas nad kyi brtag pa zhes bya ba/ slob dpon a rdzo kis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
1249 GT1254 rgyud 'grel, tshi501PD31387
57b6-58a5(p.29-4-6) sems nyid kyi de nyid bcing ba zhes bya ba tsit+ta ta t+wo pa de shaM nA ma sems nyid kyi de nyid bcing ba zhes bya ba/ slob dpon ko d+ha lis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
1250 GT1255 rgyud 'grel, tshi501PD31387
58a6-58b6(p.30-1-6) gtum mo'i thig le bkram pa zhes bya ba tsaN+Da li ka bin+du pra s+pha ra NaM nA ma gtum mo thig le bkram pa zhes bya ba/ slob dpon lu rtsi kis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
1251 GT1256 rgyud 'grel, tshi501PD31387
59a1-59a6(p.30-2-1) lus kyi rtsa thig le mnyam pa nyid kyi man ngag ces bya ba sha r-I ra Na ri ka bin+du sA mA tA aM nA ma lus kyi rtsa thig le mnyam pa nyid kyi man ngag ces bya ba/ slob dpon ni ku nis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
1252 GT1257 rgyud 'grel, tshi501PD31387
59a6-59b4(p.30-2-6) 'byung ba bzhi'i srid pa'i cha lugs zhes bya ba tsa turbud+d+ha b+ha ba b+h+ya ba sha naM kra maM nA ma byung ba bzhi'i srid pa'i cha lugs zhes bya ba/ slob dpon tsa ra pa tris mdzad pa rdzogs so//
1253 GT1258 rgyud 'grel, tshi501PD31387
59b4-60a4(p.31-2-4) rang rigs ye shes kyi lta ba'i nyams len zhes bya ba At+ma pa rig dz+nyA na dr-iSh+Ti u pa de sha nA ma rang rig ye shes kyi lta ba'i nyam len zhes bya ba/ slob dpon tsam+pa kas mdzad pa rdzogs so//
1254 GT1259 rgyud 'grel, tshi501PD31387
60a4-61a6(p.30-3-4) 'jigs pa brgyad rmongs par byed pa'i thabs zhes bya ba tsa pu ra muk+ti ka ra NaM u pa ya nA ma 'jigs pa brgyad rmongs par byed pa'i thabs zhes bya ba/ slob dpon b+ha kha nas mdzad pa rdzogs so//
1255 GT1260 rgyud 'grel, tshi501PD31387
61a6-62a1(p.30-4-6) phyi nang gi dug sel gyi rim pa zhes bya ba ba Sha an+ta ra bA h+ya ni pr-i ti pha b+ha na kra maM phyi nang nad sel gyi gdams pa/ slob dpon tai los mdzad pa rdzogs so//
1256 GT1261 rgyud 'grel, tshi501PD31387
62a1-63a2(p.32-1-1) g.yung drung 'khyil pa gsum gyi zhal gdams kyi nyams len zhes bya ba d+ha naM d+ha ta tra ya mu khA a g+haM maM nA ma g.yung drung 'khyil pa gsum gyi zhal gdams ni/ yum kaM ka la me ka las gsungs pa rdzogs so//
1257 GT1262 rgyud 'grel, tshi501PD31387
63a2-63b4(p.32-2-2) lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin zhes bya ba sa ha dzaM a nan+ta sra b+hA ba na nA ma lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin zhes bya ba/ slob dpon kaM thA ris mdzad pa rdzogs so//
1258 GT1263 rgyud 'grel, tshi501PD31387
63b4-64a3(p.33-2-4) a ti rnal 'byor gyi bsgom pa'i thabs shes bya ba a ti yo ga b+ha ba na nA ma a ti rnal 'byor gyi bsgom pa'i man ngag zhes bya ba/ slob dpon klu'i byang chub kyi mdzad pa rdzogs so//
1259 GT1264 rgyud 'grel, tshi501PD31387
64a3-64b4(p.32-3-3) byang chub sems kyi rlung rgyu ba'i gdams ngag bsgom pa zhes bya ba bA yu bo d+hi tsit+ta sra pan b+ha ba na u pa yaM nA Ma byang chub sems kyi rlung kyi rgyu ba'i gdams ngag bsgom pa zhes bya ba
1260 GT1265 rgyud 'grel, tshi501PD31387
64b4-65a2(p.33-3-4) lta spyod skye med kyi bsgom pa zhes bya ba tsar+ya dr-iSh+Ti a nut+pan+na b+ha ba na nA ma lta spyod skye med kyi bsgom pa zhes bya ba/ slob dpon pa na has mdzad pa rdzogs so//
1261 GT1266 rgyud 'grel, tshi501PD31387
65a3-66a4(p.32-4-3) tshe bsgrub pa'i gdams ngag ces bya ba a yu pa ri rak+Sha nA ma tshe bsgrub pa'i gdams ngag zhes bya ba/ slob dpon ko ki las mdzad pa rdzogs so//
1262 GT1267 rgyud 'grel, tshi501PD31387
66a4-67b1(p.34-1-4) dug sel sgom pa'i rim pa zhes bya ba bi Sha ni bar+NaM b+ha ba na naM kra maM nA ma slob dpon nag po nas rgyud pa/ slob dpon ni la khan+d+has mdzad pa rdzogs so//
1263 GT1268 rgyud 'grel, tshi501PD31387
67b1-68a2(p.35-2-1) gnyis med kyi rtsa bsgom pa'i rim pa a dra ya ni ri ka b+ha ba na kra maM gnyis med kyi rtsa bsgom pa'i rim pa rdzogs so//
1264 GT1269 rgyud 'grel, tshi501PD31387
68a2-68b1(p.34-3-2) phra ba'i rnal 'byor zhes bya ba suk+Sh+ma yo gaM nA ma phra ba'i rnal 'byor gyi nyams les zhes bya ba/ slob dpon sa mu dras mdzad/ slob dpon a raM gis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
1265 GT1270 rgyud 'grel, tshi501PD31387
68b1-69b6(p.35-3-1) phyi nang bdud rtsi'i bcud len zhes bya ba bA g+ya an+ta ra a mr-i ta kalpa nA ma slob dpon b+h+ya ris gsungs pa'i phyin nang bdud bcud len gyi gdams pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta rat+na pha las rang 'gyur du mdzad nas/ bshad rgyud kyi gdams pa bar ma chad par gsungs pa'o//
1266 GT1271 rgyud 'grel, tshi501PD31387
70b1-79a5(p.37-1-1) phyag rgya chen po'i brda'i brgyud pa'i glu ma hA mu dra bri gI ti sangs rgyas gnyis pa ltar grags pa/ bla ma rgya gar nag gu'i zhal snga nas/ bod kyi ban+de zha ma lo tsA ba byin rlabs kyi gnas mchog ding rir bsgyur te/ bla ma byang chub sems pa'i kun dga' la gtad pa rdzogs so//
1267 GT1272 rgyud 'grel, tshi501PD31387
79a5-89a1(p.40-2-5) phyag rgya chen po'i man ngag rdo rje gsang ba'i glu

1268 GT1273 rgyud 'grel, tshi501PD31387
89a1-92b4(p.44-4-1) dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i mgur zhes bya ba shrI badzra dA ki ni gI tA ya nA ma mkha 'gro ma brda'i mgur chung/ gsang mdzad 'phrul gyi rgya/ khyad par du rgyud pa/ zha ma lo tsA bas bsgyur ba'o/ rdzogs so//
1269 GT1274 rgyud 'grel, tshi501PD31387
92b4-96a4(p.47-4-4) mkha' 'gro ma'i brda'i mgur zhes bya ba badzra DA ki ni gI ta nA ma mkha' 'gro ma'i brda bam po lnga zhes bya ba/ gsang mdzod na shog dril du gnas pa las/ dbyings kyi gtso mo rnams kyis bka' bgros nas/ rje dam pa rgya gar la gnang / slad kyis dings ri bla 'khor du/ zha ma lo tsA bas bsgyur nas/ bla ma byang chub sems dpa' kun dga' la gtad pa yin no/ khyad par gyi brgyud pa chen po brgyud las/ brda skor rnam pa bzhi rdzogs so//
1270 GT1275 rgyud 'grel, tshi501PD31387
97b1-104a2(p.49-4-1) thugs kyi gsang ba glur blangs pa zhes bya ba tsit+ta gu h+ya do ha nA ma thig le dag pa'i phreng ba zhes bya ba/ grub thob pho mo brgyad bcu'i rtogs pa brjod pa/ mkha' 'gro mas yi ger btab ste/ gsang mdzod na gnas pa las/ dbyings kyi gtso mo rnams kyis bka' bgros nas/ rje dam pa rgya gar la gnang ba/ zhal ma lo tsA bas legs par bsgyur ba'o/ /rdzogs so//
1271 GT1276 rgyud 'grel, tshi501PD31387

1272 GT1277 rgyud 'grel, tshi501PD31387
109b1-116b2(p.55-4-1) phyag rgya chen po rin po che brda'i man ngag ces bya ba ma hA mu drA rat+nA b+hi gI ta u pa de sha nA ma phyag rgya chen po rin po che brda'i man ngag /rje dam pa la mkha' 'gro mas gtad de zha ma lo tsA bas bsgyur ba'o
1273 GT1278 rgyud 'grel, tshi501PD31387

ka ma shI la gnad kyi gdams pa bstan pa'o/ /rdzogs so//
1275 GT1280 rgyud 'grel, tshi501PD31387

1278 GT1283 rgyud 'grel, tshi501PD31387

1279 GT1284 rgyud 'grel, tshi501PD31387

1280 GT1285 rgyud 'grel, tshi501PD31387
139b1-173b4(p.71-2-1) rnal 'byor pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid snang ba zhes bya ba grub pa rnams kyi rdo rje'i mgur yo ga sarba tat+tA/ u mu tri a lo ka nA ma bi ka la badzra gI ta rgyal sras mi'i seng+ge rje dam pa rgya gar rin po che'i zhal snga nas/ rang 'gyur du mdzad pa/ phyag rgya chen po dum bu khrigs/ tshigs tu nyung la don 'gril/ nyams myong skyes pa rdo rje'i mgur/ ma rig mun sel sgron me 'di/ skal ldan mig gi dbang po yis/ lta bas mi doms blos mi 'khyud/ sgro 'dogs glags pa tsam gyis chod/ e ma ngo re mtshar rdzogs so//
1281 GT1286 rgyud 'grel, tshi501PD31387
174b1-188a2(p.89-1-1) phyag rgya chen po gser phreng zhes bya ba ma hA mu dra ka na ka mA le nA ma phyag rgya chen po do rje'i glu/ rin po che gser phreng zhes bya ba/ grub pa thob pa'i rnal 'byor pa dang/ paN+Di ta mang pos gsungs pa rnams/ rje btsun mnga' bdag mai tri pas/ gzhung gcig tu bsdebs pa'i gdams pa rdzogs so/ /paN+Di ta de nyid dang/ lo tsA ba mar pa chos kyi blo gros kyis bsgyur ba'o//
1282 GT1287 rgyud 'grel, tshi501PD31387

1284 GT1289 rgyud 'grel, tshi501PD31387

1286 GT1291 rgyud 'grel, tshi501PD31387
202a5-203a6(p.102-1-5) shes rab brtsam pa dus kyis gtam zhes bya ba badzra ta+shagaM b+ho sji pA ri ka thA nA ma shes rab brtsam pa dus kyis gtam zhes bya ba/ bang+ga la'i mkhas pa dpal nges par sbyangs pa dpal ldan gnyis su med pa'i rdo rjes bram ze b+ha lo la gdams pa rdzogs so//
1287 GT1292 rgyud 'grel, tshi501PD31387
203a6-204a4(p.102-2-6) ting nge 'dzin gyi tshogs kyi le'u sa mA d+hi saM b+ha ra pa ri barta ting nge 'dzin gyi tshogs kyi le'u/ slob dpon mkhas pa chen po dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so//
1288 GT1293 rgyud 'grel, tshi501PD31387
204a4-205a1(p.102-3-4) 'jig rten las 'das pa'i yan lag bdun pa'i cho ga lo ka a ti ta sap+ta ka bi d+hi 'jig rten las 'das pa'i yan lag bdun pa'i cho ga slob dpon chen po dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyis/ dpal bsam yas lhun gyis grub pa'i gtsug lag khang chen por mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /paN+Di ta de nyid dang lo tsA ba shAkya blo gros kyis bsgyur ro//
1289 GT1294 rgyud 'grel, tshi501PD31387
205a1-208b3(p.102-4-1) bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa rin po che'i gru bo zhes bya ba su ga ta shA sa na rat+na b+hi hid tra nA ma bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa rin po che'i gru bo zhes bya ba/ grub pa brnyes pa'i paN+Di ta chen po a dzi ta mi tra gup+tas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /paN+Di ta dza ga ta mi a nan+da dang bud+d+ha shrI dz+nyA dang lo tsA ba byams pa dpal gyis bsgyur ba'o//
1290 GT1295 rgyud 'grel, tshi501PD31387

409b4-419b6(p.205-3-4) byang chub kyi gzhung lam zhes bgyi ba bo d+hi pa dA ti nA ma byang chub kyi gzhung lam zhes bgyi pa slob dpon mkhas pa chen po 'jigs med 'byung gnas sbas pas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /ji ltar mthong ba bzhin bsdus pa ste gzhung gi tshad ni sh+lo ka sum brgya nyi shu rtsa lnga'o/ dang po'i las kyi bya ba ma brten par nges par byang chub mchog thob mi nus kyang / rtsod dus skye bo stong pa nyid sma zhing / gzhung lam dang po'i las kyi bya ba rnams/ mi shes mi nus mi byed pa rnams mthong / spyod 'dod mi shes 'gro la phan 'dod nas/ thub pa'i dge slong chag ston lo tsA bas/ byang chub gzhung lam 'di ni 'bang pas bsgyur/ nyes kun bzod gsol dge bas bdag gzhan rnams/ sgrib bral tshogs gnyis rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shog /kha che'i mkhan po chen po chos kyi rje shAkya shrI b+ha dra las mnyan nas/ bod yul dbus kyi sde snod 'dzin pa chag lo tsa ba dge slong dgra bcom gyis bsgyur pa'o//
